1.heading: Danish Comic Books, Strips, Etc.--Articles About.
1.title: "The Old World of the Present : The Narrative Work of Palle Nielsen"
1.author: by Matthias Wivel
1.appears_in: p. 111-116 in The Comics Journal, no. 244 (June 2002).
notes: Nielsen (1920-2000) was a Danish graphic artist who did pictures in series. This article describes his major narrative works.

notes: Collection of stories about wind by comics artists from Belgium, Germany, the U.S., the Netherlands, Denmark, Slovenia, Finland, United Kingdom, Serbia, and Italy.

97.heading: Danish Islands.
97.title: "Monster Sequence"
97.author: [No author]

98.heading: Danish People.
98.title: "Rurik the Russ" 4 p. in Real Life Comics, no. 16
98.author: [No author]
notes: "The iron-fisted, semi-legendary chief of the Danish Russ tribe, who was summoned by the Asians and founded a nation which became the nucleus of present-day Russia!"

99.heading: Danish People.
99.title: "Vitus Bering : Pioneer of the Northern Seas" 5 p. in Real Life Comics, no. 7
99.author: [No author]
notes: "This bold Danish adventurer explored the oceans from the tropics to the Arctic, and opened up the territory of Alaska to modern skill and enterprise."
